name: 0A0X Nightmask
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: AOS#Cryptid
flavor: Crucible variant. The treads know how to grip more than forty thousand terrain types.

name: Argus Deimatic
flavor: The armor-mounted transceiver antennae will happily double as melee weapons.

name: Aspriet
flavor: Crucible variant. Lightweight kinematic supports give wearers the sensation of flying.

name: Astrolord Boots
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Battuta
flavor: The first Hunters walked where no human had set foot for hundreds of years.

name: Blindsight Legs
flavor: "The courage to walk into the Darkness, but strength to return to the Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Bog Wild
flavor: Feel the swamp. Smell the swamp. Be the swamp.

name: Bones of Eao
flavor: Defy extinction.

name: Boots of No Tomorrow
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Boots of the Exile
flavor: "Many followed him when he left—if not with their feet, then with their hearts." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Boots of the Iron Lords
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Brusilov
flavor: We will find the way.

name: Carnivore Match
flavor: The Lotka-Volterra equations describe the relationship between the world and you.

name: Cold Mantis
flavor: Scarce materials and labor make it impossible to produce high-end armor in bulk.

name: Corsair's Revenge
flavor: "Wearing Fallen armor reminds me of the Fallen I killed to get it. Good times."

name: Cryptid
flavor: Autonomy is a Hunter's watchword. Far from the City, you must be swift, bold, and decisive.

name: Darkhollow Treads
flavor: "Even now, the Daughters of Oryx weave black words of blight to bind his realm to ours." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Boots
flavor: "When all is shadow, know your journey has begun." —Arach Parnell

name: Desolate Legs
flavor: Transformation is not always revelation.

name: Dustwalker
flavor: Martian dust storms erupt across the entire planet. For a Hunter, they're an opportunity to move in stealth.

name: Elector's Boots
flavor: Our footfalls forge the path to a new age.

name: Exodus Boots
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Fear Eater
flavor: No one's impervious to psychological warfare. Even the Vex develop reactions to certain foes.

name: Forester
flavor: Sparrows burn. Ships crash. The wise Hunter knows machines will fail, and makes ready to walk.

name: Fr0st-EE5
flavor: "Hey, if it works for computers..." —Marcus Ren

name: Ghost Angel
flavor: "We tracked the Fallen across the library floor, through drifts of paper and ash. The silence was magnificent."

name: Gravebreaker
flavor: In and out of the jaws of death.

name: H_LD Starwinder
flavor: Take joy in motion.

name: Harrowed Darkhollow Treads
flavor: "Even now, the Daughters of Oryx weave black words of blight to bind his realm to ours." —Eris Morn

name: Heliopause Boots
flavor: We'll walk if we have to.

name: Immanent War Boots
flavor: Tear through chaos. Leave it in ash.

name: Infinite Lines Boots
flavor: Every time I look, the Darkness just grows larger." —RECORD 345-CHASM-6736

name: Iron Breed Boots
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Boots
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Boots
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Jackknife
flavor: The programmable soles mimic the tracks of local wildlife.

name: Justicar's Boots
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
flavor: I am a KALI-GNT CHARRINGTON TACTICAL TREAD. What's on your mind?

name: Kallipolis Boots
flavor: A City is only as strong as its leader.

name: Kellhunter's Path
flavor: A strong Kell's power is like the wind: swift, howling and everywhere at once.

name: Komarov
flavor: Traditionally inscribed with a list: Komarov, Grissom, White, Chaffee and more. Souls lost to a higher purpose.

name: Long Tomorrow 9G
flavor: "He said he was determined to make it to Alpha Centauri. That was the last we ever saw him."

name: Mangala Skin
flavor: The Martian surface offers no solace to the lost. Guardians must move swiftly and be watchful.

name: Neuroghast
flavor: Unmyelinated fieldweave doesn't actually strengthen your body—just makes it feel invincible.

name: Order's Boots
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Prime Zealot Greaves
flavor: Skinned in the membranes of the Hezen Vex. There is very little risk they will become permanently attached to your body.

name: Prototype
flavor: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

name: Queen's Guard Boots
flavor: Carry yourself lightly, and with pride.

name: Radiant Dance Machines
flavor: Built for swift movement, they provide unexpected and decisive social benefits.

name: Raku Vindicator
flavor: A notable triumph in the ongoing sartorial struggle.

name: Rogue
flavor: Never hurts to carry a spare.

name: Rustburner
flavor: Cabal tactics must be countered by aggressive maneuver and concentration of force. Remain agile.

name: Sanction Custom
flavor: The key to success is destroying the enemy's ability to process and react.

name: Sanction Six
flavor: Aerospace assets are valuable. We'll walk from here.

name: Sinaa Jaguar
flavor: If the enemy flees, run them down. If the enemy strikes back, reposition. Speed is always the answer.

name: Sinaa Lamprey
flavor: Auto-pressurized joints let agile Hunters move at top speeds.

name: Snakeline
flavor: A Hunter's bootprints mark the outer edge of civilization.

name: Sojourn Boots
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Stratus
flavor: Whether the weapon is a rifle or a blade, the kill demands positioning. Know your ground.

name: Takanome Ranger
flavor: "You couldn't get far on one life alone. Not in those days." —Chiyoko Mey

name: Tireless Striders
flavor: If there is no road, then it cannot be long.

name: Tracker
flavor: "Play with the fit and the sensors until it feels like going barefoot." - Handbook of (Un)Controversial Advice

name: Treads of the Pariah
flavor: "To know true color, you must first know Darkness." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Vaquero
flavor: Giddyup.

name: Vermilion Stripe
flavor: Sooner or later, every Hunter dons the vermilion stripe.

name: Warden's Path
flavor: "Yeah, I've been to the treasure room. I think it's about time the Awoken took some of that loot and paid for an elevator." —Cayde-6

name: Watchers' Boots
flavor: "Light burns. Light heals. Light blinds. Light reveals." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Winged Sun Legs
flavor: "Feet alone cannot take us to where we're going." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Wolf Pelt Weave
flavor: "I have ten more sets just like this."

name: Raku Poltergeist 2.0
flavor: Crucible variant. Padded with light and durable diamond foam.

name: KD Bogatyr 2.0
flavor: "I'm depending on you, Guardian. Wouldn't want me to get bored, would you?" —Cayde-6

name: High Command Boots
flavor: Rise above the noise. Take the throne.

name: Eon Tracer Boots
flavor: "I feel like every time I find the thread it slips through my fingers." —RECORD-448-CHASM-6565

name: Endling Strides
flavor: We are endangered, but we can save ourselves.

name: Nanomania Boots
flavor: Nearly any problem a deep-space colonist could have, SIVA can fix. ~SIVA.MEM.WB005

name: Lion's Vigil Strides
flavor: "The challenge will come when you least expect it. You must be ready." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Boots
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Dream-Eater Strides
flavor: "'No rest for the wicked,' they used to say. Now, they say the same about Hunters."

name: Days of Iron Boots
flavor: "When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Fr0st-EE5
flavor: "Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren

name: Boots of Triumph
flavor: You've blazed your own path into legend.
